short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a fun fact about cats each time it's clicked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Need a dose of daily joy? Install our 'Daily Cat Fun Facts' extension, designed to put a smile on your face every day!

Whether you're a cat enthusiast or just someone who enjoys fun facts, this extension is perfect for you. With 'Daily Cat Fun Facts', you'll learn something new about our feline friends each day.

Here's how it works:

Simply click on the extension's icon in your browser, and a cute, random cat image alongside a fun cat fact will pop up. It's that simple! It's a great way to take a quick break from your work and indulge in a moment of feline fascination.

Our cat fun facts are educational, entertaining, and sure to make your day a little brighter. We carefully curate the facts to ensure they are interesting and varied.

From historical cat facts to insights into cat behavior and anatomy, our extension covers a wide range of topics that will please both the casual cat lover and the most passionate feline aficionado.

What's more, the extension is lightweight and won't affect your browser performance.

Install 'Daily Cat Fun Facts' now and add a touch of feline charm to your browsing experience!
